synopsis.text: Anna, a reserved and friendless girl with a passion for sketching, is sent to live with her aunt and uncle in a serene seaside town to alleviate her asthma. She spends her days exploring the sand dunes and the nearby water, until she stumbles upon an abandoned mansion, the Marsh House. There, she encounters Marnie, a lively and enigmatic girl who becomes Anna's first friend. Together, they form a deep bond that transcends reality. However, Marnie's sudden disappearance leaves Anna with more questions than answers. As she delves deeper into the secrets of the Marsh House, Anna befriends Sayaka, the new occupant of the house. Through her newfound friendships, Anna embarks on a journey of self-discovery, learning about the true meaning of friendship and uncovering the mysterious truth about Marnie.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
